Package com.ibm.team.process.common.advice.runtime

Interface Summary
IOperationAdviceListener Listener interface for notification about changes to the advice model.
IOperationAdviceManager The operation advice manager provides access to currently held operation reports and allows clients to register listeners which will be notified of events related to the advising and executing of advisable operations.
IOperationAdvisor Operation advisors are run before an operation is invoked to decide whether or not the operation should be executed.
IOperationParticipant Operation participants run after an operation is invoked and may make modifications to the repository.
IParticipantInfoCollector Report info collector which can create new infos for an operation participant.
 

Class Summary
OperationAdviceListener This listener provides default implementations for the methods defined in IOperationAdviceListener.
